long_description: The Granite Gear Traditional 3.5 canoe pack refines the age-old portage pack design with an ergonomic harness system, sternum strap, arched lid and tough materials. Rugged 210-denier Cordura(R) nylon provides durable resistance to the rigors of wilderness travel. Padded hipbelt increases stability and comfort. Drawcord top helps contain bulky contents. The Granite Gear Traditional 3.5 canoe pack fits torsos ranging from 18 - 22 in., and hip belt fits waists 26 - 52 in.
short_description: The Granite Gear Traditional 3.5 canoe pack refines the age-old portage pack design with an ergonomic harness system, sternum strap, arched lid and tough materials.
